recUpdate.title: Tyler??? Are you here??
recUpdate.content: Tyler $30 to Alan for softball, if you see Tyler ask if he has paid yet. Tyler where are you??? Are you ok??

recUpdate.title: Arthrits Water Class
recUpdate.content: The Arthritis Water class is cancelled for Friday, October12. Back again on Monday.

recUpdate.title: Cancelled Programs
recUpdate.content: Bump and  Bowl and Fruits and Veggies classes have been cancelled.

recUpdate.title: 7th & 8th Grade Girls Fall Basketball Info
recUpdate.content: For forms coming in this weekend: Accept them and put them in Dave's box.

recUpdate.title: <FONT size=5 face=Georgia>ml\'s schedule</FONT>
recUpdate.content: <FONT size=2 face=Tahoma>I\'ll be home picking pumpkins & squash thru Monday, Oct 22 (back on Tues 10/23)...Mon evening staff please bring your meals, you won\'t be able to leave after the full timers leave.  Have people leave me a message, email me, or call back on 10/23.  I can be reached on my cell if need be.  Come out & get your pumpkins!</FONT>

recUpdate.title: Toy Collection for Play Room
recUpdate.content: We are collecting gently used toys/books for the play room October 8-13. We are asking individuals to drop them off at the front counter.  As toys are dropped off please use your good judgement & give the individuals a fitness buck or two when they donate.  We\'ll store them in the break room until we sort them out.  Any questions call me!

recUpdate.title: <FONT size=5 face=Georgia>Treadmill N</FONT>
recUpdate.content: <FONT size=2 face=Tahoma>the treadmill "N" has a touchy plug or circuit board.  When people use it, if it shuts off let Al or Ron know so we can get it fixed.</FONT>

recUpdate.title: <FONT size=5 face=Georgia>Outside lights</FONT>
recUpdate.content: <FONT size=2 face=Tahoma>Openers and closers please check the outside lights to see if they need to come on earlier or shut off later. Let me know.</FONT> If its dark and they are not on let me know!!

recUpdate.title: Discounted Initiation Fees
recUpdate.content: When signing a member up & using the \"coupon\" to discount their init fee please be sure to list the discount amount in the \"discount\" column. Do NOT change the initiation fee amount. Thanks.

recUpdate.title: <FONT size=5 face=georgia>Member Visits Report</FONT>
recUpdate.content: <FONT size=2 face=arial>I have located an easier report to use when checking & printing a member\'s rec ctr visits.  Go to Reports, Pass, Visit Reports, Individual Visit History Report (3rd from the bottom). Clear the existing entries and choose Add Entry/choose the individual your are looking for.  Be sure the dates and times are correct for the request.  The report is set to include all rec center passes currently.  This should give you the listing of visits.  Any problems check with me.</FONT>

recUpdate.title: <FONT size=5 face=Georgia>Rec Dept Desks</FONT>
recUpdate.content: <FONT size=2 face=Tahoma>Front counter staff - please remember that the back desk should be used to eat at!  (ot the full time staff member's desks.)  CLEAN UP AFTER YOU EAT!  If you have a need to use a desk BE SURE TO KEEP IT CLEAN & NOT LEAVE YOUR GARBAGE ON THE DESK.  Unfortunately we do not have individual offices, so we all need to respect all individuals areas.  Thanks for your assistance, ask if you have questions.</FONT>

recUpdate.title: Fitness Bucks/Boss Bucks
recUpdate.content: A new schedule is up for both types of Bucks.Wed Oct 3-Sun Oct 7-members get $1 buck for wearing pink-and so do staff! Also-sign up for the Care 4 Breast Cancer race on Sunday, Oct 21 with the Woodstock Recreation Center team-get 5 Boss Bucks and if you beat Dave-you get 5 more! Please familarize yourself with all our special dates and promotions. See Alan If you have any questions

recUpdate.title: <FONT size=5 face=Georgia>Court #2</FONT>
recUpdate.content: <FONT size=2 face=Tahoma>The court #2 broken light has been temporarily replaced.</FONT>

recUpdate.title: <FONT size=5 face=Georgia>The Holidays are on their way...</FONT>
recUpdate.content: and Dave is in the process of purchasing holiday gifts for the staff and he needs from information from all of you!  He is purchasing jerseys from www.reebok-depot.com (look at the $18 jerseys) or you may opt out for a $20 gift card.  If you would like a jersey, take the time to look at the web-site and give us your item number and sizing information.  A sheet will be located at the schedule for you to clearly fill in your information.  Orders are due by October 31st.  Please have at least 3 options!  Remember to use the back computer (not a front one) to look up information!  Please see Melissa, Karina, or Mary Lynn for more information.

recUpdate.title: <FONT size=5 face=Georgia>Water Testing</FONT>
recUpdate.content:
Don't forget to do the water testing according to the times on the form. I'm noticing that it seems to be slipping a little.

Do It!

recUpdate.title: TRX
recUpdate.content:
the TRX sign out sheet will be in the Racquetball Reservation binder - individuals MUST check it out & initial, then check it in & initial to be sure we got it back.  If the individual is not a member and is a guest-be sure to get something of VALUE to hold until they return it. Please check to be sure the two pieces are being returned.  There is a \"TRX Exipment Checked Out\" tag in the binder to add to the customer\'s locker key hook as an extra reminder for them to turn the equipment in.

Another note - this equipment IS NOT TO LEAVE OUR BUILDING!  No one (including staff) should be taking it out to use outside or at home.  I have the DVD - if you would like to borrow it please check it out.  thanks. 

Ariel would be happy to train any Front Counter staff interested in learning how to utilize it-just let her know and schedule a time!

recUpdate.title: <FONT size=5 face=Georgia>Weight Loss Challenge</FONT>
recUpdate.content: <FONT size=2 face=Tahoma>Anyone that was signed up for the weight loss challenge can sign up for a membership without an initiation fee.</FONT>

recUpdate.title: Pool/Hot Tub Testing info
recUpdate.content:
Front counter is resonsible for testing and putting results on the clip board, Full time staff (Dave, Alan & ML) are reponsible for state testing for the blue binder.

Now when testing the Pool and Hot Tub write exactly where you move the Bromine dial to.  This should help with avoiding the fluctuations.

Make sure that you are testing both pool and Hot tub according to the times listed on the clipboard. We have to keep our readings within the state guidelines of pH 7.2- 7.6 and Bromine 4 - 8. If it is \"getting close to\" or outside of the limits fix it immediately. Failure to do the testing will not be tolerated. If you have any questions talk to me or call me.

recUpdate.title: <FONT size=5 face=Georgia>Dectron (dehumidifier for pool area)</FONT>
recUpdate.content:
VERY IMPORTANT - RUN THE EXTENSION CORD OUTSIDE THE BUILDING IN THE DOOR NEAR THE DRYER!!! Dectron is not working correctly-please try to keep the hottub turned off when it is not in use-Guillermo-1st thing in the morning if the pool is not busy open the far door about 1/2 way & put the large fan in the door blowing the air out of the pool area....close the door before classes start (call me if ?'s)

It should be fixed on SOON!

recUpdate.title: <FONT size=5 face=Georgia>Dave's Voicemail</FONT>
recUpdate.content: Dave's voicemail is not working correctly, so please don't send anyone to his phone to leave a message.  Write down the message for him if needed or give them his email: dzinnen@woodstockil.gov

recUpdate.title: New Memberships
recUpdate.content: When signing people up for new memberships please be sure to explain the RULES on the back of the membership form---remind them to read them!  Thanks...

recUpdate.title: <FONT size=5 face=Georgia>Pool Testing</FONT>
recUpdate.content: <FONT size=2 face=Tahoma>When testing the pool make sure that you test the Shallow and Deep end of the pool. I have 3 testing tubes in the test kit. One marked "H" for Hot Tub, one marked "PS" for pool shallow and and one marked "PD" for pool deep. Thank you for your understanding and great attitudes. The world is a better place with you in it!!</FONT>

recUpdate.title: <FONT size=4 face=Arial><FONT size=5 face=georgia>POOL INFO!!</FONT> </FONT>
recUpdate.content: Morning openers, on days when we shock the pool we are going to leave the big fan on all night. In the morning shut off the fan and put it back in the corner by the outside door. Also any time you are working and the bromine levels are above 10 shut off the bromine feeder and keep an eye on the levels or tell the next shift. If the levels are above 12 we have a chemical that we can add to the pool to lower levels, we need to close the pool for about 15 minutes. Until I get a procedure printed, call me if you need to add this chemical.

recUpdate.title: <FONT size=5 face=Georgia>Paul Rabrich</FONT>
recUpdate.content: <FONT size=2 face=Tahoma>He would like us to call his cell phone when his bus arrives to pick him up so he doesn't miss it. 815-337-0034</FONT>

recUpdate.title: <FONT size=5 face=Georgia>Sam Argento</FONT>
recUpdate.content: <FONT size=2 face=Tahoma>Do not let him (or anyone else) use the pool if it is being used for a class. Do not let him "ask the instructor" if its ok because it is not. He knows that when the pool is in use he should not use it because we have had this conversation before. </FONT> He must be paid up to utilize the Rec Center.

recUpdate.title: <FONT size=5 face=Georgia>Tuesday Night/Wednesday Morning</FONT>
recUpdate.content: <FONT size=2 face=Tahoma>Reminder - If you close tuesday night or open wenesday morning, make sure there is one table set up in multi-purpose room A and put the wall up. The class starts at 8:30am and everything must be ready to go by that time!</FONT>

recUpdate.title: <FONT size=5 face=Georgia>Basketballs</FONT>
recUpdate.content: <FONT size=2 face=Tahoma>If teams come in looking for their basketballs they are in the back hallway closet in black garbage bags. Find out the coaches name for the team, all bags are specific to a team with a copy of the roster and coaches names on them. Any additional questions talk to Dave.</FONT>

recUpdate.title: <FONT size=5 face=Georgia>Pool Locker room doors</FONT>
recUpdate.content: <FONT size=2 face=Tahoma>The black that is on the men's and women's locker room door frames is not mold. We used a chemical that turns rust into a primable surface that we can paint. The black means that the product is working. We will be painting the door frames this coming weekend. If anyone have any questions they can talk to Ron or Alan.</FONT>

recUpdate.title: Swim Lessons
recUpdate.content: There is a sign that can be put out during swim lessons so members do not get in the pool. There will be no exceptions anymore.  The sign is next to the rags.

recUpdate.title: <FONT size=5 face=Georgia>Countdown to Christmas</FONT>
recUpdate.content: <FONT size=2 face=Tahoma>The Countdown to Christmas is December 1-21. The only thing the members have to do is come in and workout.  Each day a winner will be picked from those that checked in. We have 21 gifts. When their name gets chosen, we can call them to come in and pick a wrapped gift.</FONT> There is a list to keep track of who won a present-please initial if you hand one out. The list is by the presents on the cart.

recUpdate.title: <FONT size=5 face=Georgia>developmental basketball</FONT>
recUpdate.content: <FONT size=2 face=Tahoma>Grades 4-6 BOYS basketball-ask Dave before signing anyone up-hold the registration & give to him if one is dropped off.  Boys 1st-3rd grad, girls 1st-4th & 5th&6th ok to accept registration fee now $100</FONT>

recUpdate.title: <FONT size=5 face=Georgia>Countdown to Christmas</FONT>
recUpdate.content: <FONT size=2 face=Tahoma>Take pictures of the people who win the prizes.</FONT>

recUpdate.title: <FONT size=5 face=Georgia>tues 12/11</FONT>
recUpdate.content: <FONT size=2 face=Tahoma>I'm at home working on the schedule!  call if you need anything...</FONT>

recUpdate.title: Lap Swim at the Rec Ctr $3
recUpdate.content: because we no longer offer lap swim at the high schools we are allowing morning (5-6:30am)lap swim here at the rec ctr pool for $3.  The code for this has been added to the daily visit area. Any questions--please ask!

recUpdate.title: <FONT size=5 face=Georgia>Giving Tree</FONT>
recUpdate.content: <FONT size=2 face=Tahoma>Please read the info in your box about the Giving Tree. Customers pick an ornament, buy a gift, attach the ornament & turn in to us by December 10!  The customers utilize the tree near the entrance and the staff can pick from the tree which is set up in the microwave/fridge mail room.  Thanks.</FONT>

recUpdate.title: <FONT size=5 face=Georgia>Dance Reg for Winter/Spring</FONT>
recUpdate.content:
Monday, Nov 19 at 9am we can accept registration for dance classes ONLINE (our first online registration). 

If you get questions about this please contact a full timer-we will explain how to send the customer their user name & password.  Participants who are currently registered in dance can sign up for the WInter/Spring session starting Monday, Nov 12 at the Rec Center.  Deadline to reg early is Nov 30. The memo that was passed out to parents is on the white board behind the counter. One thing to note-People should sign up for the same level they are currently in. Questions? Ask Renee!

recUpdate.content: <FONT size=2 face=Tahoma>Numbers are a little low for the Breakfast with Santa so I'm not charging for the Late fee starting Dec 9th. I am advertizing that the deadline to register is Dec 12 so we can give our numbers to the Moose for amounts of food and drink. After the 12th if people want to register ask me to see where we are.</FONT>

recUpdate.title: <FONT size=5 face=Georgia>Cupcake Class cancelled</FONT>
recUpdate.content: Due to low enrollment. I gave a h/h credit to each participant. If they call and want a check mailed to them-please let a full time staff now to process that.

recUpdate.title: <FONT size=5 face=Georgia>Fitness Bucks</FONT> Items to purchase
recUpdate.content: <FONT size=2 face=Tahoma>In the drawer (under the cash drawer) are 1 day passes to sell for $5 Fitness Bucks, the water bottles, bags and tshirts are on top of the cabinet behind Alan & Becky's desks - boxes are marked.  Lip Balm is on shelf across from Alan's desk (front of building). If a member would like to redeem the bucks for a FULL month of dues please ask a full timer for assistance.  When this is done be sure I get a copy of the receipt!  Very important so the bucks get applied to their memberhsip!!</FONT>

recUpdate.title: <FONT size=5 face=Georgia>holiday schedules</FONT>
recUpdate.content: <FONT size=2 face=Tahoma>All full time staff will be out of the office on 12/24 & 25.  Check the calendar for exact schedules over the holidays.  I'll be out 12/18,19,20 & most likely 21.  Call me if you have a question. Ask customers to email me or check back on 12/26.  thanks!</FONT>

recUpdate.title: <FONT size=5 face=Georgia>shirts on my desk</FONT>
recUpdate.content: <FONT size=2 face=Tahoma>Aimee Reese will be in to check out polo shirts on my desk - please give her the black tshirt.  Ask her to leave me color choices and a size choice on the note on my desk. Call me if you have ?'s.  thanks</FONT>

recUpdate.title: <FONT size=5 face=Georgia>Fitness Bucks</FONT>
recUpdate.content: <FONT size=2 face=Tahoma>Please remind members to use their Fitness Bucks by December 31. They expire on that day and there will be no exceptions to roll them to the next year. <FONT color=#990000 size=4>They MUST have a complete month's worth of bucks to use them for their rec center dues.</FONT> When this is done be sure I get a copy of the receipt!  Very important so the bucks get applied to their memberhsip!!<FONT size=3 face="Times New Roman">      </FONT> If they don't have enough for dues, the can purchase guest passes, chapstick, water bottle, shirts, bags.</FONT> <FONT size=2 face=Tahoma>In the drawer (under the cash drawer) are 1 day passes to sell for $5 Fitness Bucks, the water bottles, bags and tshirts are in bins under the front counter near the pool </FONT>

recUpdate.content: Paul will be in WITHOUT a caregiver-he will be dropped off and picked up by public transportation-he would like to utilize the Rec Center on his own. If you have any other issues (such as anger) let Dave Z know or a full time staff member immediately!  Call me if there is not a full time staff member available.

recUpdate.content: <FONT size=2 face=Tahoma>We are out of the duplicate membership forms  (we should have more later today or Tues morning).  Use the copies we have and BE SURE to give the customer a two sided copy of their form.  Thanks</FONT>

recUpdate.title: <FONT size=5 face=Georgia>pH in pool</FONT>
recUpdate.content: <FONT size=2 face=Tahoma>We are having low pH problems with the pool if you test the pH at 6.9 or lower call me and I'll tell you what to do. </FONT>

recUpdate.title: <FONT size=5 face=Georgia>Closed Basketball Leagues</FONT>
recUpdate.content:
Here is a list of the developmental bball leagues that are closed.  There will be NO EXCEPTIONS if the group is closed. Continue to check this for updates as the groups fill.  Direct those interesed in the open groups to Dave. 

Boys:1/2-open, 3-closed, 4-closed, 5/6-closed

Girls:1/2-1spot, 3/4-open, 5/6-closed

recUpdate.title: <FONT size=5 face=Georgia>Adult Basketball League</FONT>
recUpdate.content: Deadline is Friday, Jan 18 at 5pm. Take any forms after that but put a date and time on the form and have them call me on Monday to see if they can get in.

recUpdate.title: <FONT size=5 face=Georgia>Speed, Agility and Quickness Training</FONT>
recUpdate.content: <FONT size=2 face=Tahoma>Class has been cancelled</FONT>

recUpdate.title: <FONT size=5 face=Georgia>boys basketball </FONT>
recUpdate.content: <FONT size=2 face=Tahoma>There is a binder with the rosters for the boys basketball teams under the counter.</FONT>

recUpdate.title: <FONT size=5 face=Georgia>tanning</FONT>
recUpdate.content: <FONT size=2 face=Tahoma>Front counter staff-be sure you are checking the information the customer fills in on the pink sheet-<FONT color=#ff3366>ask them to leave the book open so you can review it. </FONT> The inspector hasn't been here in a bit & we need to be following the rules-make sure the year & the am or pm is completed each time a person tans.</FONT> <FONT color=#3333ff>This is currently not being done-please follow these instructions!!!</FONT>

recUpdate.title: <FONT size=5 face=Georgia>RecTrac Ticklers</FONT>
recUpdate.content: <FONT size=2 face=Tahoma><FONT color=#660066 size=4>PLEASE be sure to remove the tickler once you have accomplished what is listed on the computer!</FONT>  If an individual provides payemnt or a cc update to you be sure to take the tickler off the computer.  It is very confusing to the customer if we ask them day after day for the same info!!  Thanks for your help.</FONT>

recUpdate.title: <FONT size=5 face=Georgia>Mens Basketball</FONT>
recUpdate.content: <FONT size=2 face=Tahoma>All mens bball league games are cancelled for tonight Wed 1/30----unfortunately we could not get officials!</FONT> Tonights games will be played next Wed.

recUpdate.title: <FONT size=5 face=Georgia>Rec Ctr Hours</FONT>
recUpdate.content:
Beginning Sunday, January 27 the rec center will be open Mon-Fri from 5am-9pm, Saturday & Sunday 7am-5pm!   We will review facility usage in April to decide if we keep these hours or change to "summer" hours.

on Sunday 1/27 please let the open bball players play 1-5pm if they would like and let them know beginning Sunday 2/3 open bball will be 3-5pm only

recUpdate.title: <FONT size=5 face=Georgia>Delivery for pool supplies</FONT>
recUpdate.content:
I should be getting a delivery from In the Swim. It is the pool test supplies. Please open it and let the front counter staff have what they need. We are out of or almost out of a couple of bottles. Keep all of the empty bottles I will refill them.

recUpdate.title: <FONT size=5 face=Georgia>New Bromine Bucket...</FONT>
recUpdate.content: <FONT size=2 face=Tahoma>In the back room there is a New Blue RubberMaid Bin (on wheels) that now contains the bromine tablets and new scoop. It is labeled "Bromine Tablets" and is portable for easier use. </FONT>

recUpdate.title: <FONT size=5 face=Georgia>mp room</FONT>
recUpdate.content: <FONT size=2 face=Tahoma>wednesday 2/13/13 the heat does not work in the mp room - the repair man has been out & parts are on order.  if there is a class scheduled please leave the doors open so some of the gym heat goes into the mp room</FONT>

recUpdate.title: <FONT size=5 face=Georgia>Front Counter Staff Meeting</FONT>
recUpdate.content: <FONT size=2 face=Tahoma>Friday, Feb 22 at 1pm---DON'T FORGET!! </FONT>

recUpdate.title: <FONT size=5 face=Georgia>Facebook Likes</FONT>
recUpdate.content: <FONT size=2 face=Tahoma>Anyone that has liked us on Facebook this week gets ONE Fitness Buck. I have been keeping track and put it in their household tickler. When it pops up, please give them a buck and then delete it from the tickler. Thank you.</FONT>

recUpdate.title: <FONT size=5 face=Georgia>Land Fitness Evals</FONT>
recUpdate.content: <FONT size=2 face=Tahoma>There are evals for land fitness participants to fill out.  They get ONE Fitness Buck for turning them in.</FONT> All evals should be given to me. Let me know if you have any questions.
